__e: No matter what you intend to do, please don't hurt my son.
I don't know what you're trying to do here but I want you out of my apartment-- now.
Someplace where the sun is always shining and the sky is blue, and... and you can be free to do whatever you want to do.
Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to go get my son.
Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to get to my nephew's wedding.
- Cheers. If you'll excuse me, this Mary needs to get her son to bed.
I... as much as you all want me to be part of your team, that's never going to happen.
And unless you want the world to know it, we're out of here.
Unless you want your king to look elsewhere for friends.
